chapterinfo.title: User Information
chapterinfo.subtitle: A New "Open Systems" Approach for NATO
chapterinfo.corpauthor: C3B Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT)

section.title: Information for users
section.para: This version contains the NISP Volumes 1 - 4 in both html and pdf formats. This is the NISP User-Info Page. In order to access the NISP Home Page or the individual NISP Volumes, use the relevant links in the navigation bar.
If you wish to have further information on this Distribution, please contact:
section.literallayout: Mr. Kenneth DeWandel NATO HQ SACT E-Mail: kenneth.dewandel@act.nato.int
